name: VRtuos Pro
description:
Description:

Just calibrate your real piano, import your favourite songs and press play! Notes will fall directly onto your keys, so it's really easy to learn how to play any song pretty fast. Download .mid files from the internet, or import your midi music.

This version will be regularly updated. Features like: direct USB midi input, SteamVR support, metronome, more environments, any size pianos and much more are in the plans for future updates.

Features:
  • New UI and calibration
  • New piano model
  • Midi piano support
  • Localization support
  • Folders and custom backgrounds
  • Customizable environment
  • and much more...
Installation:

Install the APK and launch the game. Download your favourite songs. They have to be in the .mid format. Mp3's will not work. Navigate to \Android\data\com.PavelMarceluch.VRtuosPro\files\Midis\ and put all your .mid files there.

You can sort all your midis into folders, VRtuos will recognize them and let you browse through them. Every folder can also have its own custom background. A template is present in the root directory.

Companion app:

Download the VRtuos Companion App for Windows and connect your Quest and midi piano via local wifi. 5GHz is recommended. In an upcoming update, there will be no need for that and you will be able to connect your piano via USB. Support for the Companion will continue.


Calibration:

You need to own a real piano. Use controllers to calibrate it. Please closely follow in-game instructions. You can recalibrate at any time from the menu.

Contact:

If you find a bug, have a suggestion or you just want to tell me something, hit me up right here on Itch, SideQuest, or join my Discord. We already have an awesome community that will help you with anything you need and I am there all the time.

Before you buy:

You need to own/or have access to a real piano. This app isn't a piano simulator. This app lets you see notes coming on the keys so that it is easier to play and learn. If you are not sure of this purchase, you can download the free trial version of VRtuos on SideQuest.

But if you decide to buy VRtuos, thank you. It means a lot to get this amount of support and it enables me to do what I love.
